Title: New process to describe radiation damage at the molecular level. Application to 125I seeds in water
Abstract: © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.We present the first step of a general study on induced damage by 125I in water at the molecular level.Requirements for such a study are introduced and preliminary results on the emission spectra of 125I seeds are presented.
